price: 92. Vous n’atteindrez à la vertu que lorsque vous aurez dépensé de ce qui vous est cher, et vous ne dépenserez rien qu’Allah ne sache parfaitement.
arabic: لَن تَنَالُواْ ٱلۡبِرَّ حَتَّىٰ تُنفِقُواْ مِمَّا تُحِبُّونَۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lan tanālū al-bira ḥattā tunfiqū mimmā tuḥibbūna wamā tunfiqū min shayin fa-inna al-laha bihi ʿalīmun
